vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: 動議其後就相同議程項目下任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後進行點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion that in the event of further divisions being claimed of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)39 開立新承擔額14億3,300萬元，用以為居於香港房屋委員會和香港房屋協會公共租住單位的較低收入租戶代繳1個月租金
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)39 A new commitment of $1,433 million to provide one month’s rent for lower-income tenants living in the public rental units of the Hong Kong Housing Authority and the Hong Kong Housing Society

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)39 提高承擔額55億6,900萬元，用以向合資格的住宅用戶提供一次過電費補貼
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)39 An increase in commitment by $5,569 million to provide a one-off electricity charges subsidy to eligible residential households

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)39 開立新承擔額22億5,000萬元，用以在2019／20學年為日校學生提供每人2,500元津貼
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)39 A new commitment of $2,250 million to provide a subsidy of $2,500 for each day-school student in the 2019/20 school year

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)39 i) 開立新承擔額38億8,800萬元，用以發放一次過額外款項予綜合社會保障援助受助人及公共福利金領取者；ii) 開立新承擔額1億3,600萬元，用以發放一次過額外款項予領取在職家庭津貼的住戶；及iii) 開立新承擔額1,900萬元，用以發放一次過額外款項予領取以個人為申請單位的鼓勵就業交通津貼的人士
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)39 i) A new commitment of $3,888 million to provide a one-off extra allowance to recipients of Comprehensive Social Security Assistance and Social Security Allowance; ii) a new commitment of $136 million to provide a one-off extra allowance to recipients of Working Family Allowance; and iii) a new commitment of $19 million to provide a one-off extra allowance to recipients of Individual-based Work Incentive Transport Subsidy

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2019-20)39 i) 開立新信貸保證承擔額330億元，預計最高開支為54億元，以供香港按證保險有限公司在其"中小企融資擔保計劃"下推出新的信貸擔保產品；ii) 增加"發展品牌、升級轉型及拓展內銷市場的專項基金"的承擔額20億元；iii) 擴大資助地域範圍；以及 iv)增加"市場推廣及工商機構支援基金"的承擔額10億元
vote.motion-en: FCR(2019-20)39 i) A new loan guarantee commitment of $33 billion with an expected maximum expenditure of $5.4 billion to introduce a new loan guarantee product under HKMC Insurance Limited's SME Financing Guarantee Scheme; ii) an increase in commitment by $2 billion for the Dedicated Fund on Branding, Upgrading and Domestic Sales; iii) extend the geographical coverage of the Fund; and iv) an increase in commitment by $1 billion for the Export Marketing and Trade and Industrial Organisation Support Fund
